title: Succession Final Season Premiere BREAKDOWN (FULL SPOILERS)
description:
Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to get Rocket Money.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KINDAFUNNY for 50% off 2 or more pairs of
polarized sunglasses.

IGN's Simon Cardy joins Tim and Greg to discuss the first episode of Season 4 of HBO's Succession.

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
